headline: How Adding Indra Nooyi To The Board At Honeywell International (HON) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: On December 10, 2025, Honeywell International announced that Indra Nooyi, former Chair and CEO of PepsiCo and current Amazon audit committee chair, will join its Board as an Independent Director effective January 1, 2026. Nooyi’s track record in global consumer markets, corporate finance, and board governance introduces a fresh combination of operational and oversight experience that could influence Honeywell’s portfolio and capital allocation decisions.
